ModMetaData.name: Glitter Tech - No Surgery
ModMetaData.author: Xavior
ModMetaData.description:
(Unoffical Version for 1.3) I am not the original author GlitterTech adds a ton of shiny new and futuristic items found on the richer developed Glitter worlds. But, this expensive and illegal tech attracts attention of Glitter world Commandos. This is the No Surgery version.
Original Mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725576127 Pulled and updated from: 725657237 mod folder Original Git Repo: https://github.com/sam23694/GlitterTech/tree/1.0.2059 Current Mod Repo: https://github.com/mdrain18/XaviorsGlitterTech.git
